column4: Hi there. Using Ubuntu 8.10, pretty new to linux. Until last night everything was working fine. Woke up this morning, and there's no sound. There's sound at the login screen, but when I am logged in nothing. Any ideas?
Close firefox and test for sound?
Yeah,  but try Slart's idea first.
try typing killall pulseaudio from a terminal and retesting?
Let me dig up the forums to see if I get something. What's your hardware?
: And at this point my mind goes utterly blank. Does ubuntu have a nice way of finding out hardware, or should I just boot back into windows?
lspci command. Check to see if it picks up your sound card.
Neaai , jrib : 05:02.0 Multimedia audio controller: Creative Labs SB Audigy LS
Uh-oh. The threads I dug up relate to the Audigy card.
Wait one. Searching some more on the forums.
: Np, thankee. Weird though - I just found the command aplay -l and ran it. It doesnt list the SB.
I'm with you, buddy, running some searches. Give me a couple of minutes.
I'm still digging. Follow Neaai's instructions and see if that works.
I think Neaai's pointed you on the right track. :) If I were you, I'd do the same thing.
